[33m<course_title>Business Analysis Foundations: Strategy Analysis<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Strategy analysis is one of the six major knowledge areas of business analysis, and practitioners must be able to incorporate [0m
[33mstrategy analysis practices into their work activities. In this course, instructor Laura Paton begins with the basics of strategy analysis, including [0m
[33mthe value and concepts. Next, Laura shows you how to start performing Strategy Analysis with four key tasks, starting with analyzing the current state[0m
[33menvironment. She covers strategies to elicit information from stakeholders, conduct a gap analysis, and identify risk. Laura also explains the [0m
[33msolution options and financial measures that you can use to assess the viability of a proposed solution. Plus, she discusses techniques such as [0m
[33mcreating a business case to present your analysis to decision makers.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>A Modern Guide to Strategy Implementation<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Successful leaders need to know how to define and choose the right strategies for their organizations. But they also need to be [0m
[33mable to implement them successfully, which is where the Strategy Implementation Roadmap can be a huge help. In this course, instructor Antonio [0m
[33mNieto-Rodriguez walks you through the basics of strategy implementation so you can develop the highly demanded skills and tools you need to become an [0m
[33meffective implementation specialist.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;Explore ways to enhance your leadership abilities in an increasingly complex business world. [0m
[33mGet an introduction to strategy implementation fundamentals, as developed by world experts from the Strategy Implementation Institute. Learn to avoid [0m
[33mcommon pitfalls and adopt a proven and simple to use roadmap to guide your organization through its strategy implementation journey, including [0m
[33mleadership execution, value creation, stakeholder management, business culture, employee engagement, performance tracking, and [0m
[33mmore.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>Business Design: Turning Ideas Into Business<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>How do you strategically turn an idea into a real business you can grow and sustain over time? In this course, learn best [0m

[33mshows you how to create, capture, and deliver value by turning your idea into a business that can thrive over time. She covers the fundamentals of how[0m
[33mbusiness design works, with real world examples, exercises, and worksheets. This course also includes frameworks, inspiring stories, and practical [0m
[33mtools to drive growth and innovation in organizations of any size or sectorÃ¢â‚¬â€for-profit, government, or non-profit. Learn clear principles for [0m

[33m<course_title>Business Fundamentals for Customer Success Managers<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>It's critical for customer success managers [0m[1;33m([0m[33mCSMs[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m to have a solid understanding of how businesses work and how value is created [0m
[33mand measured, yet relatively few CSMs ever receive training on this vital subject. This course can help CSMs quickly get up to speed by providing a [0m
[33mprimer on the fundamentals of business management. Learn about the connections between customer success and business awareness, the reasons why [0m
[33mbusinesses exist, how businesses create value, and how expenditure and profits are calculated. Review how businesses work in terms of how they are [0m
[33morganized, what they do, what resources they need, and what relationships they have with other entities. Plus, learn about the principles of business [0m
[33mmanagement, including how and why change occurs within a business and how business strategy is formulated and applied. This course can be taken on its[0m
[33mown, or as one in a series from PracticalCSM.com that build upon each other to cover CSM best practices in greater detail.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>Data-Informed Strategic Thinking for Senior Analysts and Data Scientists<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>For data scientists, connecting your work to a firmÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s business strategy can often be difficult both in terms of the business [0m
[33mlanguage used by leaders and the analytical tools [0m[1;33m([0m[33mand simple explanations[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m needed to guide their thinking. In this course, learn how to frame [0m
[33manalytical results using strategy language so you can better connect your key outputs with the important needs of a firmÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s strategic thinkers and [0m
[33mdecision-makers. Dr. Paul Thurman shows you how to collaborate with business leaders to present data analytic solutions in non-scientific, [0m
[33mbusiness-oriented language. Learn what Ã¢â‚¬Å“strategyÃ¢â‚¬Â means and the role data science plays, discover how to analyze a market and strategy to assess a[0m
[33mfirmÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s competitiveness, and put a market-tested strategy into effect with the three-pronged thinking framework of conceptual, analytical, and [0m

[33m<course_title>Business Analytics Foundations: Predictive, Prescriptive, and Experimental Analytics<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Business analytics encompasses a set of tools, technologies, processes, and best practices that are required to derive knowledge [0m
[33mfrom data. It's an iterative and methodical exploration of data to derive insights from itÃ¢â‚¬â€and, in turn, make smarter, more strategic decisions that[0m
[33mare grounded in facts. In this course, learn about the stages in business analytics that are used to predict and build the futureÃ¢â‚¬â€predictive [0m
[33manalytics, prescriptive analytics, and experimental analytics. This course dives into each stage, discussing the tools and techniques used for each, [0m
[33mas well as best practices leveraged in the field. In addition, the course lends a real-world context to these concepts by using a use case to [0m
[33mdemonstrate how to execute analytics in each stage.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>Data-Informed Strategic Thinking for Senior Analysts and Data Scientists<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>For data scientists, connecting your work to a firmÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s business strategy can often be difficult both in terms of the business [0m
[33mlanguage used by leaders and the analytical tools [0m[1;33m([0m[33mand simple explanations[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m needed to guide their thinking. In this course, learn how to frame [0m
[33manalytical results using strategy language so you can better connect your key outputs with the important needs of a firmÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s strategic thinkers and [0m
[33mdecision-makers. Dr. Paul Thurman shows you how to collaborate with business leaders to present data analytic solutions in non-scientific, [0m
[33mbusiness-oriented language. Learn what Ã¢â‚¬Å“strategyÃ¢â‚¬Â means and the role data science plays, discover how to analyze a market and strategy to assess a[0m
[33mfirmÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s competitiveness, and put a market-tested strategy into effect with the three-pronged thinking framework of conceptual, analytical, and [0m
[33moperational strategy.Check out this course to help business leaders learn more from analyses and ensure your data-informed recommendations result in [0m
[33mimplementable strategies!<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>Business Analysis Foundations: Strategy Analysis<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Strategy analysis is one of the six major knowledge areas of business analysis, and practitioners must be able to incorporate [0m
[33mstrategy analysis practices into their work activities. In this course, instructor Laura Paton begins with the basics of strategy analysis, including [0m
[33mthe value and concepts. Next, Laura shows you how to start performing Strategy Analysis with four key tasks, starting with analyzing the current state[0m
[33menvironment. She covers strategies to elicit information from stakeholders, conduct a gap analysis, and identify risk. Laura also explains the [0m
[33msolution options and financial measures that you can use to assess the viability of a proposed solution. Plus, she discusses techniques such as [0m
[33mcreating a business case to present your analysis to decision makers.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>Business Analysis Foundations<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>One of the main reasons given for unsuccessful project results is the lack of clear understanding of stakeholder requirements. [0m
[33mBusiness analysis helps to prevent project failure by identifying and validating those requirements early on. Of course, business analysis doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t [0m
[33mstop with requirementsÃ¢â‚¬â€business analysts also recommend solutions and facilitate their execution. This course provides an introduction to the [0m
[33mfoundations of business analysis. It helps demystify the role of the business analyst [0m[1;33m([0m[33mBA[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, and outlines the knowledge and skills required to build a [0m
[33msuccessful BA career. Instructor Greta Blash also provides an in-depth review of the business analysis process, from conducting a needs assessment and[0m
[33midentifying stakeholders to testing, validation, and release. Each lesson demonstrates why business analysis worksÃ¢â‚¬â€and how you can use it to improve[0m
[33myour organization.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m

[33m<course_title>Strategic Planning: Case Studies<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m

[33mcases studies. Join instructor Mike Figliuolo as he shares examples from a consumer goods business, a professional services company, and a nonprofit [0m
[33morganization. For each case he shares five key aspects of the strategy planning process: defining the strategic environment, determining how to [0m
[33mcompete, evaluating and prioritizing opportunities, assessing the initiative portfolio, and organizing and allocating resources. Use these thorough [0m

[33m<course_title>Global Strategy<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Globalization is a double-edged sword. Global firms benefit from a larger market, scale- and location-based cost efficiencies, and[0m
[33mexposure to a multiplicity of new product and process ideas. However, globalization also exposes firms to numerous challenges resulting from a [0m
[33mdramatic increase in diversity, complexity, and uncertainty. This course is aimed at helping managers learn how to maximize the benefits while [0m
[33mminimizing the costs and risks associated with global expansion. Anil K. Gupta, Michael Dingman Chair in Strategy and Globalization at The University [0m
[33mof Maryland's Smith School, and a leading expert on global strategy, outlines the logic of global strategy and the questions you must address in order[0m
[33mto globalize your company's market presence and leverage global resources.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>Leading Global Expansion<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Global expansion can help a company grow faster, enjoy the benefits of global scale, and tap into the unique advantages of [0m
[33mdifferent locations. Yet, global expansion also creates many challengesÃ¢â‚¬â€such as exposure to unfamiliar cultures and markets, difficulties in [0m
[33mcoordinating far-flung operations, and greater organizational complexity. Whether global expansion adds or destroys value depends on your company's [0m
[33mability to build the necessary local capabilities in the different markets and manage the global network effectively. In this course, join Anil Gupta [0m
[33mand Haiyan Wang, two of the world's foremost experts on global strategy, as they step through how to maximize the benefits and minimize the costs and [0m
[33mrisks when leading a company which spans multiple markets. Discover how to connect with the local market, manage across cultures, cultivate employee [0m
[33mengagement in foreign subsidiaries, cultivate a global mindset, and more.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>Leading Global Organizations<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m

[33mfive key hurdles global leaders need to understand and overcome to lead a global team or organisation successfully. He outlines the key challenges and[0m
[33mprovides ideas on how to overcome them. The first challenge that Kevan discusses is the need to manage people across distance, in multiple locations, [0m
[33mwith limited face-to-face time. He then covers how to interpret and manage cultural differences and how to plan for and create successful [0m
[33mcommunication across different regions and time zones. He discusses the challenge of navigating and managing a more complex global Ã¢â‚¬Å“matrixedÃ¢â‚¬Â [0m
[33moperating environment. Kevan concludes with advice on how you can systematically improve your global leadership approach.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m

[1;34m<[0m[1;34mcurriculum_description[0m[34m>[0m
[34m  The Business Strategy Learning Path is designed to equip professionals with the foundational and advanced skills required to formulate, analyze, and[0m
[34mexecute effective business strategies. This progressive series of video courses addresses core analytical frameworks, decision-making methodologies, [0m
[34mand strategic leadership skills that are crucial for enhancing organizational performance and driving career growth.[0m

[34m  <course [0m[34mnumber[0m[34m=[0m[34m"1"[0m[34m>[0m
[34m    <title>Fundamentals of Business Strategy<[0m[34m/[0m[34mtitle[0m[34m>[0m
[34m    <description>[0m
[34m      In this introductory course, learners will explore the key concepts, definitions, and historical evolution of business strategy. The course [0m
[34mcovers strategic management theories, the purpose of strategy within various business contexts, and introduces the critical role of strategic [0m
[34malignment in achieving organizational goals. This foundational knowledge sets the stage for deeper exploration in subsequent courses.[0m

[34m    <description>[0m
[34m      This course delves into the core analytical tools necessary for evaluating competitive environments and internal capabilities. Topics include [0m
[34mindustry and market analysis [0m[1;34m([0m[34mPorterâ€™s Five Forces, PESTEL analysis[0m[1;34m)[0m[34m, SWOT analysis, and value chain analysis. By mastering these frameworks, learners[0m
[34mcan effectively assess external challenges and internal opportunities to inform strategic decisions.[0m

[34mimportance of resource allocation. Learners will gain insights into the systematic planning process that converts data insights into actionable [0m
[34mstrategies.[0m

[34m    <description>[0m
[34m      This course examines the execution phase of strategic plans by exploring effective evaluation and implementation techniques. Key areas include [0m
[34mdecision-making under uncertainty, risk management, measuring performance through key performance indicators [0m[1;34m([0m[34mKPIs[0m[1;34m)[0m[34m, and adjusting strategies in [0m
[34mresponse to market dynamics. It bridges the gap between strategic planning and tangible business outcomes.[0m

[33m<course_title>Business Analysis Foundations: Strategy Analysis<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Strategy analysis is one of the six major knowledge areas of business analysis, and practitioners must be able to incorporate [0m
[33mstrategy analysis practices into their work activities. In this course, instructor Laura Paton begins with the basics of strategy analysis, including [0m
[33mthe value and concepts. Next, Laura shows you how to start performing Strategy Analysis with four key tasks, starting with analyzing the current state[0m
[33menvironment. She covers strategies to elicit information from stakeholders, conduct a gap analysis, and identify risk. Laura also explains the [0m
[33msolution options and financial measures that you can use to assess the viability of a proposed solution. Plus, she discusses techniques such as [0m
[33mcreating a business case to present your analysis to decision makers.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m

[33mable to implement them successfully, which is where the Strategy Implementation Roadmap can be a huge help. In this course, instructor Antonio [0m
[33mNieto-Rodriguez walks you through the basics of strategy implementation so you can develop the highly demanded skills and tools you need to become an [0m
[33meffective implementation specialist.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;Explore ways to enhance your leadership abilities in an increasingly complex business world. [0m
[33mGet an introduction to strategy implementation fundamentals, as developed by world experts from the Strategy Implementation Institute. Learn to avoid [0m
[33mcommon pitfalls and adopt a proven and simple to use roadmap to guide your organization through its strategy implementation journey, including [0m

[33m<course_title>Business Fundamentals for Customer Success Managers<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>It's critical for customer success managers [0m[1;33m([0m[33mCSMs[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m to have a solid understanding of how businesses work and how value is created [0m
[33mand measured, yet relatively few CSMs ever receive training on this vital subject. This course can help CSMs quickly get up to speed by providing a [0m
[33mprimer on the fundamentals of business management. Learn about the connections between customer success and business awareness, the reasons why [0m
[33mbusinesses exist, how businesses create value, and how expenditure and profits are calculated. Review how businesses work in terms of how they are [0m
[33morganized, what they do, what resources they need, and what relationships they have with other entities. Plus, learn about the principles of business [0m
[33mmanagement, including how and why change occurs within a business and how business strategy is formulated and applied. This course can be taken on its[0m

[33m<course_title>Business Analytics Foundations: Predictive, Prescriptive, and Experimental Analytics<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Business analytics encompasses a set of tools, technologies, processes, and best practices that are required to derive knowledge [0m
[33mfrom data. It's an iterative and methodical exploration of data to derive insights from itÃ¢â‚¬â€and, in turn, make smarter, more strategic decisions that[0m
[33mare grounded in facts. In this course, learn about the stages in business analytics that are used to predict and build the futureÃ¢â‚¬â€predictive [0m
[33manalytics, prescriptive analytics, and experimental analytics. This course dives into each stage, discussing the tools and techniques used for each, [0m
[33mas well as best practices leveraged in the field. In addition, the course lends a real-world context to these concepts by using a use case to [0m
[33mdemonstrate how to execute analytics in each stage.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m

[33mthe value and concepts. Next, Laura shows you how to start performing Strategy Analysis with four key tasks, starting with analyzing the current state[0m

[33m<course_title>Business Analysis Foundations<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>One of the main reasons given for unsuccessful project results is the lack of clear understanding of stakeholder requirements. [0m
[33mBusiness analysis helps to prevent project failure by identifying and validating those requirements early on. Of course, business analysis doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t [0m
[33mstop with requirementsÃ¢â‚¬â€business analysts also recommend solutions and facilitate their execution. This course provides an introduction to the [0m
[33mfoundations of business analysis. It helps demystify the role of the business analyst [0m[1;33m([0m[33mBA[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, and outlines the knowledge and skills required to build a [0m
[33msuccessful BA career. Instructor Greta Blash also provides an in-depth review of the business analysis process, from conducting a needs assessment and[0m
[33midentifying stakeholders to testing, validation, and release. Each lesson demonstrates why business analysis worksÃ¢â‚¬â€and how you can use it to improve[0m
[33myour organization.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>Business Analysis for Busy Professionals<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>A baseline of business analysis techniques and steps is a valuable asset in any industry, organization, department and context. [0m
[33mThis course with business consultant Christina Charenkova provides a toolkit for evaluating and making key business decisions. Knowing how to apply [0m
[33mbusiness analysis techniques and which tools to use to test hypotheses provides an analytical framework for approaching complex business problems [0m
[33mwhilst helping to make informed decisions that benefit any organization. As Christina shows, having a toolbox of business analysis techniques can lead[0m
[33mnot only to better decision making, but it can also help busy professionals drive strategic decision making and give them the ability to thrive in any[0m
[33mbusiness field.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>Strategic Planning: Case Studies<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Have you ever wanted to see strategic planning frameworks applied to real situations? Would you find it helpful to see an [0m
[33mintegrated strategic case study for an organization like yours? Go more deeply into the strategic planning process by diving into three real-world [0m
[33mcases studies. Join instructor Mike Figliuolo as he shares examples from a consumer goods business, a professional services company, and a nonprofit [0m
[33morganization. For each case he shares five key aspects of the strategy planning process: defining the strategic environment, determining how to [0m
[33mcompete, evaluating and prioritizing opportunities, assessing the initiative portfolio, and organizing and allocating resources. Use these thorough [0m
[33mexamples to think through how you would apply strategic planning to your own organization.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m

[33morganizationÃ¢â‚¬â€a process that can be repeated yearly and ensures you get input from all relevant stakeholders. In this course, Mike shows you how to [0m
[33mestablish and articulate your organization's core competencies, vision, mission, and strategic filters. Using these criteria, he shows how to [0m

[33m<course_title>Business Analysis Foundations: Strategy Analysis<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Strategy analysis is one of the six major knowledge areas of business analysis, and practitioners must be able to incorporate [0m
[33mstrategy analysis practices into their work activities. In this course, instructor Laura Paton begins with the basics of strategy analysis, including [0m
[33mthe value and concepts. Next, Laura shows you how to start performing Strategy Analysis with four key tasks, starting with analyzing the current state[0m
[33menvironment. She covers strategies to elicit information from stakeholders, conduct a gap analysis, and identify risk. Laura also explains the [0m
[33msolution options and financial measures that you can use to assess the viability of a proposed solution. Plus, she discusses techniques such as [0m
[33mcreating a business case to present your analysis to decision makers.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m

[33m<course_title>Global Strategy<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Globalization is a double-edged sword. Global firms benefit from a larger market, scale- and location-based cost efficiencies, and[0m
[33mexposure to a multiplicity of new product and process ideas. However, globalization also exposes firms to numerous challenges resulting from a [0m
[33mdramatic increase in diversity, complexity, and uncertainty. This course is aimed at helping managers learn how to maximize the benefits while [0m
[33mminimizing the costs and risks associated with global expansion. Anil K. Gupta, Michael Dingman Chair in Strategy and Globalization at The University [0m
[33mof Maryland's Smith School, and a leading expert on global strategy, outlines the logic of global strategy and the questions you must address in order[0m
[33mto globalize your company's market presence and leverage global resources.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>Leading Global Expansion<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Global expansion can help a company grow faster, enjoy the benefits of global scale, and tap into the unique advantages of [0m
[33mdifferent locations. Yet, global expansion also creates many challengesÃ¢â‚¬â€such as exposure to unfamiliar cultures and markets, difficulties in [0m
[33mcoordinating far-flung operations, and greater organizational complexity. Whether global expansion adds or destroys value depends on your company's [0m
[33mability to build the necessary local capabilities in the different markets and manage the global network effectively. In this course, join Anil Gupta [0m
[33mand Haiyan Wang, two of the world's foremost experts on global strategy, as they step through how to maximize the benefits and minimize the costs and [0m
[33mrisks when leading a company which spans multiple markets. Discover how to connect with the local market, manage across cultures, cultivate employee [0m
[33mengagement in foreign subsidiaries, cultivate a global mindset, and more.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>Leading Global Organizations<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_description>Global leadership is a step up in complexity from traditional leadership. In this course, instructor Kevan Hall introduces the [0m
[33mfive key hurdles global leaders need to understand and overcome to lead a global team or organisation successfully. He outlines the key challenges and[0m
[33mprovides ideas on how to overcome them. The first challenge that Kevan discusses is the need to manage people across distance, in multiple locations, [0m
[33mwith limited face-to-face time. He then covers how to interpret and manage cultural differences and how to plan for and create successful [0m
[33mcommunication across different regions and time zones. He discusses the challenge of navigating and managing a more complex global Ã¢â‚¬Å“matrixedÃ¢â‚¬Â [0m
[33moperating environment. Kevan concludes with advice on how you can systematically improve your global leadership approach.<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_description[0m[33m>[0m

[1;36massistant:[0m
[34mHere are ten mammals:[0m

[1;34m1[0m[34m. African elephant[0m
[1;34m2[0m[34m. Grizzly bear[0m
[1;34m3[0m[34m. Cheetah[0m
[1;34m4[0m[34m. Blue whale[0m
[1;34m5[0m[34m. Red kangaroo[0m
[1;34m6[0m[34m. Bottlenose dolphin[0m

[1;34m9[0m[34m. Gray wolf[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36muser:[0m
[33mYou are an L&D administrator at a large enterprise organization, and regularly create curricula for various[0m
[33mprofessional audiences. [0m

[33mHere are some examples of how you map out the audience for a given curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mEXAMPLE: Customer Success curriculum[0m
[1;33m1[0m[33m. Early career people considering a Customer Success career path.[0m
[1;33m2[0m[33m. People currently in customer service roles and who are looking to leverage their skills to move into [0m
[33mmore specialized customer success positions.[0m
[1;33m3[0m[33m. People in adjacent roles who want/need to embrace a service mindset[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Javascript curriculum[0m
[33mBeginning web developers or programmers without experience in Javascript[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Docker curriculum[0m
[33mSofware developers and DevOps Engineers[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: DevOps curriculum[0m
[33mDevOps Engineers, and developer [0m[33m/[0m[33m IT needing a basic understanding of DevOps practices[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Microservices curriculum[0m
[33mDevelopers and architects who need to skill up on designing, building, and migrating systems to a [0m
[33mmicroservices architecture.[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: C++ curriculum[0m
[33mThis audience is a little different from the Python certificate audience. While Python is a [0m[33m"gateway drug"[0m[33m [0m
[33mto programming for a very wide audience, people who are interested in C++ are likely higher intent to be [0m
[33msoftware developers. As such, this certificate presumes some basic conversational knowledge with [0m
[33mprogramming, and ramps up more quickly from beginner to advanced topics.[0m
[33mThree personas:[0m
[33m* Beginners who want to start learning C++ programming from scratch and quickly progress to writing their [0m
[33mown programs and applications.[0m
[33m* Existing C++ programmers who want to take their skills to the next level by mastering more advanced [0m
[33mconcepts, techniques, and best practices.[0m
[33m* Developers coming from other programming languages who need to get up to speed with C++ syntax, [0m
[33mfundamentals, and common design patterns.[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Business Skills for Nurses curriculum[0m
[33mNurses who are keen to grow into mgmt positions[0m
[33m================================[0m

[33mLook at this list of course titles and descriptions for a new curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33m**Agile Foundations**: Learn the foundational concepts you need to know to start thinking like an agile [0m
[33mteam.[0m
[33m**Scrum: The Basics**: Learn what scrum is and how you can start implementing it in your project management[0m
[33mworkflow.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m Projects, Boards, and Issues**: Get an overview of agile [0m
[33mmethodology and Jira, and learn how to use project boards, make logged issues more useful, and leverage the[0m
[33mkanban method.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m2[0m[33m Lean and Agile Processes**: Learn about lean and agile [0m
[33mprinciples, scrum roles, Jira Query Language [0m[1;33m([0m[33mJQL[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, and more.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m Advanced Topics**: Learn how to use filters, identify and [0m
[33mclassify epics, and work with dashboards in Jira. Review lessons from all three courses in this series.[0m
[33m**Mistakes to Avoid in Agile Project Management**: Learn how you can avoid common pitfalls of working in [0m
[33magile project management.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mHow would you describe the audience for this learning path? Your answer should not be longer than [0m[1;33m100[0m[33m [0m
[33mwords.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36massistant:[0m
[34m# Agile Project Management Curriculum Audience[0m

[34mThis curriculum targets three key groups:[0m

[1;34m1[0m[34m. Project managers transitioning from traditional to agile methodologies who need practical implementation[0m
[34mskills.[0m

[1;34m2[0m[34m. Team members new to agile practices seeking to understand the mindset, principles, and common frameworks[0m
[1;34m([0m[34mespecially Scrum[0m[1;34m)[0m[34m.[0m

[1;34m3[0m[34m. Professionals in any role looking to effectively use Jira Cloud for agile project management, from basic[0m
[34msetup through advanced features.[0m

[34mThe content assumes minimal prior agile knowledge while providing sufficient depth for practical [0m
[34mapplication in real work environments.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36muser:[0m
[33mYou are an L&D administrator at a large enterprise organization, and regularly create training programs for[0m
[33mvarious professional audiences.[0m

[33mHere are some examples of how you create descriptions of your learning programs:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mNursing professionals are expected to have both clinical and business skills to succeed in management [0m
[33mroles. This learning path teaches the skills needed to excel in healthcare management: business basics, [0m
[33mproject management, financial literacy, and how to use AI tools to enhance productivity. Tune in, pass the [0m
[33mfinal exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[33mWant to learn what microservices are all about? This architecture pattern helps developers work faster and [0m
[33mbuild more resilient systems. These courses cover everything from beginner foundations to advanced patterns[0m
[33mand refactoring codebases. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your professional certificate.[0m

[33mDevOps is not a framework or a workflow. DevOps ensures collaboration and communication between software [0m
[33mengineers [0m[1;33m([0m[33mDev[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m and IT operations [0m[1;33m([0m[33mOps[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m. Whether you are new to DevOps or looking to review the [0m
[33mfundamentals, these courses can help. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[33mC++ is renowned for its performance, control, and versatility. Ready to get started? Begin by mastering the[0m
[33mfundamentals and then progress to proven techniques for writing well-organized, efficient code. By the end,[0m
[33myou'll have the knowledge you need to create your own C++ programs and applications. Tune in, pass the [0m
[33mfinal exam, and earn your professional certificate.[0m

[33mContainers help developers pack up their applications, ensuring they run smoothly anywhere. Software [0m
[33mdevelopers need to understand these technologies to deliver software as a team. Whether you are new to [0m
[33mDocker or looking to review the fundamentals, these courses can help. Tune in, pass the final exam, and [0m
[33mearn your certificate.[0m

[33mJavaScript is the key to a career in front-end development. These courses equip you with essential skills [0m
[33mto master the language, from fundamental concepts like variables and functions to advanced topics such as [0m
[33masynchronous tasks and DOM scripting. With hands-on practice and real-time feedback, you'll gain the [0m
[33mexpertise needed to excel in web development. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m
[33m================================[0m

[33mYour team is going to publish a certtificate program titled:[0m
[33mAtlassian Agile Project Management Professional Certificate[0m

[33mNow look at this list of course titles and descriptions for a curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33m**Agile Foundations**: Learn the foundational concepts you need to know to start thinking like an agile [0m
[33mteam.[0m
[33m**Scrum: The Basics**: Learn what scrum is and how you can start implementing it in your project management[0m
[33mworkflow.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m Projects, Boards, and Issues**: Get an overview of agile [0m
[33mmethodology and Jira, and learn how to use project boards, make logged issues more useful, and leverage the[0m
[33mkanban method.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m2[0m[33m Lean and Agile Processes**: Learn about lean and agile [0m
[33mprinciples, scrum roles, Jira Query Language [0m[1;33m([0m[33mJQL[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, and more.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m Advanced Topics**: Learn how to use filters, identify and [0m
[33mclassify epics, and work with dashboards in Jira. Review lessons from all three courses in this series.[0m
[33m**Mistakes to Avoid in Agile Project Management**: Learn how you can avoid common pitfalls of working in [0m
[33magile project management.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mHow would you describe this learning path? Structure your answer like the examples given above, and use [0m
[33mthis overall pattern:[0m

[1;33m1[0m[33m. **Introduction**: Introduce the topic or subject matter.[0m
[1;33m2[0m[33m. **Value Proposition**: Highlight the benefits or outcomes of engaging with the content.[0m
[1;33m3[0m[33m. **Course Overview**: Provide a brief overview of what the courses cover or what skills will be learned.[0m
[1;33m4[0m[33m. **Call to Action**: The final sentence should always be [0m[33m"Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your [0m
[33mcertificate."[0m

[33mThe length of your answer should be between [0m[1;33m40[0m[33m and [0m[1;33m60[0m[33m words.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36massistant:[0m
[34mAgile project management is revolutionizing how teams deliver value. This certificate program teaches you [0m
[34mAtlassian's approach to agile methodology using Jira Cloud, covering everything from foundational concepts [0m
[34mto advanced implementation techniques. You'll learn scrum principles, kanban methods, and practical [0m
[34mstrategies to avoid common agile pitfalls. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36muser:[0m

[33mYou are an L&D administrator at a large enterprise organization, and regularly create training programs for[0m
[33mvarious professional audiences.[0m

[33mYou are going to generate [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m-[0m[1;33m4[0m[33m learning objectives for a new curriculum. [0m

[33mThe learning goals should be expressed as short sentences, with up to [0m[1;33m60[0m[33m characters each. Each sentence [0m
[33mshould start with one of these verbs:[0m

[33mPlan Analyze Identify Practice Create Discover Compare Explore Describe Research[0m

[33mThe learning goals should address what the courses cover in sequence, to the extent that you can understand[0m
[33mthat from the course descriptions.[0m

[33mHere is the list of courses and descriptions for the curriculum.[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33m**Agile Foundations**: Learn the foundational concepts you need to know to start thinking like an agile [0m
[33mteam.[0m
[33m**Scrum: The Basics**: Learn what scrum is and how you can start implementing it in your project management[0m
[33mworkflow.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m Projects, Boards, and Issues**: Get an overview of agile [0m
[33mmethodology and Jira, and learn how to use project boards, make logged issues more useful, and leverage the[0m
[33mkanban method.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m2[0m[33m Lean and Agile Processes**: Learn about lean and agile [0m
[33mprinciples, scrum roles, Jira Query Language [0m[1;33m([0m[33mJQL[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, and more.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m Advanced Topics**: Learn how to use filters, identify and [0m
[33mclassify epics, and work with dashboards in Jira. Review lessons from all three courses in this series.[0m
[33m**Mistakes to Avoid in Agile Project Management**: Learn how you can avoid common pitfalls of working in [0m
[33magile project management.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mYour answer should only be the learning objectives, in a numbered liss; no other text.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36massistant:[0m
[1;34m1[0m[34m. Identify fundamental agile principles and mindset.[0m
[1;34m2[0m[34m. Analyze scrum methodology for project workflow.[0m
[1;34m3[0m[34m. Practice using Jira tools for agile project management.[0m
[1;34m4[0m[34m. Compare lean principles and scrum roles in agile processes.[0m
[1;34m5[0m[34m. Create effective Jira dashboards and manage epics.[0m
[1;34m6[0m[34m. Discover common agile implementation pitfalls to avoid.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36muser:[0m
[33mThe following is a description of a professional certificate program that my company is going to publish:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mAgile project management is revolutionizing how teams deliver value. This certificate program teaches you [0m
[33mAtlassian's approach to agile methodology using Jira Cloud, covering everything from foundational concepts [0m
[33mto advanced implementation techniques. You'll learn scrum principles, kanban methods, and practical [0m
[33mstrategies to avoid common agile pitfalls. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m
[33m================================[0m

[33mThis is the title of the program: Atlassian Agile Project Management Professional Certificate[0m

[33mWrite a short congratulatory message that I can send to my colleagues to announce this partnership. [0m

[33mStart with: [0m[33m"[0m[33m[[0m[33mPartner[0m[33m][0m[33m has signed for a [0m[33m!"[0m
[33mThen a description of why the topic is important.[0m
[33mThen a description of why the Partner is such a good fit for this topic.[0m
[33mAnnouncement should be one paragraph, [0m[1;33m40[0m[33m-[0m[1;33m70[0m[33m words long.[0m

[33mUse the following example announcements as context for this task.[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mArista Networks has signed for a Network Automation Professional Certificate! Arista is the industry leader[0m
[33min cloud networking for large data center, campus and routing environments [0m[1;33m([0m[33m$90bn market cap[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m and is the [0m
[33mprimary networking services provider for big tech companies like Microsoft and Meta. [0m

[33mThe American Nurses Association has signed on for a Business Skills for Nurses certificate! With over [0m[1;33m4[0m[33m [0m
[33mmillion members, the ANA is the largest nursing industry association in the United States, with workforce [0m
[33mdevelopment a critical part of its mission. This is part of a broader initiative across LinkedIn to get [0m
[33mmore nurses on the platform. Per discussion with the ANA, the certificate will be unlocked for six months. [0m

[33mMozilla has signed on for a Javascript Foundations Professional Certificate! As an early leader in open [0m
[33msource software for the internet, Mozilla advocates for open web standards, net neutrality, and user [0m
[33mprivacy. Their Developer Network [0m[1;33m([0m[33mMDN[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m is the go-to resource for web development documentation with over [0m
[33m17M monthly users. As the third-most in-demand programming language for our users [0m[1;33m([0m[33mafter Python and Java[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, [0m
[33mthis certificate on Javascript fills an important gap in our library. We plan to follow this with [0m
[33mcertificates on HTML and CSS.[0m

[33mC++ Institute has signed for a C++ Programming Professional Certificate, for publication in FYQ1. C++ is [0m
[33mthe third-most popular programming language after Python and C. The C++ Institute [0m[1;33m([0m[33ma subsidiary of OpenEDG[0m[1;33m)[0m
[33mis the market leader in C++ training and certification.[0m

[33mKong has signed for a Microservices Professional Certificate, for publication in FYQ1. Microservices is the[0m
[33mmost popular architecture pattern for developers, and this certificate will complement our certificates on [0m
[33mDocker and devops. Kong is a recognized leader in the field of microservices and API management.[0m
[33m================================[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36massistant:[0m
[34mAtlassian has signed for a Atlassian Agile Project Management Professional Certificate! In today's [0m
[34mfast-paced business environment, agile methodologies have become essential for teams to deliver value [0m
[34mquickly and adapt to changing requirements. Atlassian, with its industry-leading Jira platform used by over[0m

[34mimplementing effective agile practices.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36muser:[0m
[33mYou are an L&D administrator at a large enterprise organization, and regularly create curricula for various[0m
[33mprofessional audiences. [0m

[33mHere are some examples of how you map out the audience for a given curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mEXAMPLE: Customer Success curriculum[0m
[1;33m1[0m[33m. Early career people considering a Customer Success career path.[0m
[1;33m2[0m[33m. People currently in customer service roles and who are looking to leverage their skills to move into [0m
[33mmore specialized customer success positions.[0m
[1;33m3[0m[33m. People in adjacent roles who want/need to embrace a service mindset[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Javascript curriculum[0m
[33mBeginning web developers or programmers without experience in Javascript[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Docker curriculum[0m
[33mSofware developers and DevOps Engineers[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: DevOps curriculum[0m
[33mDevOps Engineers, and developer [0m[33m/[0m[33m IT needing a basic understanding of DevOps practices[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Microservices curriculum[0m
[33mDevelopers and architects who need to skill up on designing, building, and migrating systems to a [0m
[33mmicroservices architecture.[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: C++ curriculum[0m
[33mThis audience is a little different from the Python certificate audience. While Python is a [0m[33m"gateway drug"[0m[33m [0m
[33mto programming for a very wide audience, people who are interested in C++ are likely higher intent to be [0m
[33msoftware developers. As such, this certificate presumes some basic conversational knowledge with [0m
[33mprogramming, and ramps up more quickly from beginner to advanced topics.[0m
[33mThree personas:[0m
[33m* Beginners who want to start learning C++ programming from scratch and quickly progress to writing their [0m
[33mown programs and applications.[0m
[33m* Existing C++ programmers who want to take their skills to the next level by mastering more advanced [0m
[33mconcepts, techniques, and best practices.[0m
[33m* Developers coming from other programming languages who need to get up to speed with C++ syntax, [0m
[33mfundamentals, and common design patterns.[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Business Skills for Nurses curriculum[0m
[33mNurses who are keen to grow into mgmt positions[0m
[33m================================[0m

[33mLook at this list of course titles and descriptions for a new curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33m**Agile Foundations**: Learn the foundational concepts you need to know to start thinking like an agile [0m
[33mteam.[0m
[33m**Scrum: The Basics**: Learn what scrum is and how you can start implementing it in your project management[0m
[33mworkflow.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m Projects, Boards, and Issues**: Get an overview of agile [0m
[33mmethodology and Jira, and learn how to use project boards, make logged issues more useful, and leverage the[0m
[33mkanban method.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m2[0m[33m Lean and Agile Processes**: Learn about lean and agile [0m
[33mprinciples, scrum roles, Jira Query Language [0m[1;33m([0m[33mJQL[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, and more.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m Advanced Topics**: Learn how to use filters, identify and [0m
[33mclassify epics, and work with dashboards in Jira. Review lessons from all three courses in this series.[0m
[33m**Mistakes to Avoid in Agile Project Management**: Learn how you can avoid common pitfalls of working in [0m
[33magile project management.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mHow would you describe the audience for this learning path? Your answer should not be longer than [0m[1;33m100[0m[33m [0m
[33mwords.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36massistant:[0m
[34m# Agile Project Management Curriculum Audience[0m

[34mThis curriculum targets three key groups:[0m

[1;34m1[0m[34m. Project managers transitioning from traditional to agile methodologies who need practical implementation[0m
[34mskills.[0m

[1;34m2[0m[34m. Team members new to agile practices seeking to understand the mindset, principles, and common frameworks[0m
[1;34m([0m[34mespecially Scrum[0m[1;34m)[0m[34m.[0m

[1;34m3[0m[34m. Professionals in any role looking to effectively use Jira Cloud for agile project management, from basic[0m
[34msetup through advanced features.[0m

[34mThe content assumes minimal prior agile knowledge while providing sufficient depth for practical [0m
[34mapplication in real work environments.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36muser:[0m
[33mYou are an L&D administrator at a large enterprise organization, and regularly create training programs for[0m
[33mvarious professional audiences.[0m

[33mHere are some examples of how you create descriptions of your learning programs:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mNursing professionals are expected to have both clinical and business skills to succeed in management [0m
[33mroles. This learning path teaches the skills needed to excel in healthcare management: business basics, [0m
[33mproject management, financial literacy, and how to use AI tools to enhance productivity. Tune in, pass the [0m
[33mfinal exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[33mWant to learn what microservices are all about? This architecture pattern helps developers work faster and [0m
[33mbuild more resilient systems. These courses cover everything from beginner foundations to advanced patterns[0m
[33mand refactoring codebases. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your professional certificate.[0m

[33mDevOps is not a framework or a workflow. DevOps ensures collaboration and communication between software [0m
[33mengineers [0m[1;33m([0m[33mDev[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m and IT operations [0m[1;33m([0m[33mOps[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m. Whether you are new to DevOps or looking to review the [0m
[33mfundamentals, these courses can help. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[33mC++ is renowned for its performance, control, and versatility. Ready to get started? Begin by mastering the[0m
[33mfundamentals and then progress to proven techniques for writing well-organized, efficient code. By the end,[0m
[33myou'll have the knowledge you need to create your own C++ programs and applications. Tune in, pass the [0m
[33mfinal exam, and earn your professional certificate.[0m

[33mContainers help developers pack up their applications, ensuring they run smoothly anywhere. Software [0m
[33mdevelopers need to understand these technologies to deliver software as a team. Whether you are new to [0m
[33mDocker or looking to review the fundamentals, these courses can help. Tune in, pass the final exam, and [0m
[33mearn your certificate.[0m

[33mJavaScript is the key to a career in front-end development. These courses equip you with essential skills [0m
[33mto master the language, from fundamental concepts like variables and functions to advanced topics such as [0m
[33masynchronous tasks and DOM scripting. With hands-on practice and real-time feedback, you'll gain the [0m
[33mexpertise needed to excel in web development. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m
[33m================================[0m

[33mYour team is going to publish a certtificate program titled:[0m
[33mAtlassian Agile Project Management Professional Certificate[0m

[33mNow look at this list of course titles and descriptions for a curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33m**Agile Foundations**: Learn the foundational concepts you need to know to start thinking like an agile [0m
[33mteam.[0m
[33m**Scrum: The Basics**: Learn what scrum is and how you can start implementing it in your project management[0m
[33mworkflow.[0m

[33mmethodology and Jira, and learn how to use project boards, make logged issues more useful, and leverage the[0m
[33mkanban method.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m2[0m[33m Lean and Agile Processes**: Learn about lean and agile [0m
[33mprinciples, scrum roles, Jira Query Language [0m[1;33m([0m[33mJQL[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, and more.[0m

[33mclassify epics, and work with dashboards in Jira. Review lessons from all three courses in this series.[0m
[33m**Mistakes to Avoid in Agile Project Management**: Learn how you can avoid common pitfalls of working in [0m
[33magile project management.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mHow would you describe this learning path? Structure your answer like the examples given above, and use [0m
[33mthis overall pattern:[0m

[1;33m1[0m[33m. **Introduction**: Introduce the topic or subject matter.[0m
[1;33m2[0m[33m. **Value Proposition**: Highlight the benefits or outcomes of engaging with the content.[0m
[1;33m3[0m[33m. **Course Overview**: Provide a brief overview of what the courses cover or what skills will be learned.[0m
[1;33m4[0m[33m. **Call to Action**: The final sentence should always be [0m[33m"Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your [0m
[33mcertificate."[0m

[33mThe length of your answer should be between [0m[1;33m40[0m[33m and [0m[1;33m60[0m[33m words.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36massistant:[0m
[34mAgile project management is revolutionizing how teams deliver value. This certificate program teaches you [0m
[34mAtlassian's approach to agile methodology using Jira Cloud, covering everything from foundational concepts [0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m

[33mthat from the course descriptions.[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33m**Agile Foundations**: Learn the foundational concepts you need to know to start thinking like an agile [0m
[33mteam.[0m

[33mworkflow.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m

[1;36muser:[0m
[33mThe following is a description of a professional certificate program that my company is going to publish:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mAgile project management is revolutionizing how teams deliver value. This certificate program teaches you [0m
[33mAtlassian's approach to agile methodology using Jira Cloud, covering everything from foundational concepts [0m
[33mto advanced implementation techniques. You'll learn scrum principles, kanban methods, and practical [0m
[33mstrategies to avoid common agile pitfalls. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m
[33m================================[0m

[33mThis is the title of the program: Atlassian Agile Project Management Professional Certificate[0m

[33mWrite a short congratulatory message that I can send to my colleagues to announce this partnership. [0m

[33mStart with: [0m[33m"[0m[33m[[0m[33mPartner[0m[33m][0m[33m has signed for a [0m[33m!"[0m
[33mThen a description of why the topic is important.[0m
[33mThen a description of why the Partner is such a good fit for this topic.[0m
[33mAnnouncement should be one paragraph, [0m[1;33m40[0m[33m-[0m[1;33m70[0m[33m words long.[0m

[33mUse the following example announcements as context for this task.[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mArista Networks has signed for a Network Automation Professional Certificate! Arista is the industry leader[0m
[33min cloud networking for large data center, campus and routing environments [0m[1;33m([0m[33m$90bn market cap[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m and is the [0m
[33mprimary networking services provider for big tech companies like Microsoft and Meta. [0m

[33mThe American Nurses Association has signed on for a Business Skills for Nurses certificate! With over [0m[1;33m4[0m[33m [0m
[33mmillion members, the ANA is the largest nursing industry association in the United States, with workforce [0m
[33mdevelopment a critical part of its mission. This is part of a broader initiative across LinkedIn to get [0m
[33mmore nurses on the platform. Per discussion with the ANA, the certificate will be unlocked for six months. [0m

[33mMozilla has signed on for a Javascript Foundations Professional Certificate! As an early leader in open [0m
[33msource software for the internet, Mozilla advocates for open web standards, net neutrality, and user [0m
[33mprivacy. Their Developer Network [0m[1;33m([0m[33mMDN[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m is the go-to resource for web development documentation with over [0m
[33m17M monthly users. As the third-most in-demand programming language for our users [0m[1;33m([0m[33mafter Python and Java[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, [0m
[33mthis certificate on Javascript fills an important gap in our library. We plan to follow this with [0m
[33mcertificates on HTML and CSS.[0m

[33mC++ Institute has signed for a C++ Programming Professional Certificate, for publication in FYQ1. C++ is [0m
[33mthe third-most popular programming language after Python and C. The C++ Institute [0m[1;33m([0m[33ma subsidiary of OpenEDG[0m[1;33m)[0m
[33mis the market leader in C++ training and certification.[0m

[33mKong has signed for a Microservices Professional Certificate, for publication in FYQ1. Microservices is the[0m
[33mmost popular architecture pattern for developers, and this certificate will complement our certificates on [0m
[33mDocker and devops. Kong is a recognized leader in the field of microservices and API management.[0m
[33m================================[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36muser:[0m
[33mYou are an L&D administrator at a large enterprise organization, and regularly create curricula for various[0m
[33mprofessional audiences. [0m

[33mHere are some examples of how you map out the audience for a given curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mEXAMPLE: Customer Success curriculum[0m
[1;33m1[0m[33m. Early career people considering a Customer Success career path.[0m
[1;33m2[0m[33m. People currently in customer service roles and who are looking to leverage their skills to move into [0m
[33mmore specialized customer success positions.[0m
[1;33m3[0m[33m. People in adjacent roles who want/need to embrace a service mindset[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Javascript curriculum[0m
[33mBeginning web developers or programmers without experience in Javascript[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Docker curriculum[0m
[33mSofware developers and DevOps Engineers[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: DevOps curriculum[0m
[33mDevOps Engineers, and developer [0m[33m/[0m[33m IT needing a basic understanding of DevOps practices[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Microservices curriculum[0m
[33mDevelopers and architects who need to skill up on designing, building, and migrating systems to a [0m
[33mmicroservices architecture.[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: C++ curriculum[0m
[33mThis audience is a little different from the Python certificate audience. While Python is a [0m[33m"gateway drug"[0m[33m [0m
[33mto programming for a very wide audience, people who are interested in C++ are likely higher intent to be [0m
[33msoftware developers. As such, this certificate presumes some basic conversational knowledge with [0m
[33mprogramming, and ramps up more quickly from beginner to advanced topics.[0m
[33mThree personas:[0m
[33m* Beginners who want to start learning C++ programming from scratch and quickly progress to writing their [0m
[33mown programs and applications.[0m
[33m* Existing C++ programmers who want to take their skills to the next level by mastering more advanced [0m
[33mconcepts, techniques, and best practices.[0m
[33m* Developers coming from other programming languages who need to get up to speed with C++ syntax, [0m
[33mfundamentals, and common design patterns.[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Business Skills for Nurses curriculum[0m
[33mNurses who are keen to grow into mgmt positions[0m
[33m================================[0m

[33mLook at this list of course titles and descriptions for a new curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33m**Introduction to Data Science**: Get to know the exciting world of data science in this beginner-friendly [0m
[33mcourse.[0m
[33m**Statistics Foundations [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m: The Basics**: Learn to understand your data using basics of statistics, such as[0m
[33mdefining the middle, mean, and median of your data set; measuring the standard deviation; and finding [0m
[33moutliers.[0m
[33m**Statistics Foundations [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m: Using Data Sets**: Go beyond the basics of statistics with practical, [0m
[33mexample-based lessons to learn how data sets and statistics are used in the real world.[0m
[33m**Learning Python**: Get started with Python, the popular and highly-readable object-oriented language.[0m
[33m**Python Data Analysis**: Interested in using Python for data analysis? Learn how to use Python, NumPy, and[0m
[33mpandas together to analyze data sets large and small.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mHow would you describe the audience for this learning path? Your answer should not be longer than [0m[1;33m100[0m[33m [0m
[33mwords.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
[1;36massistant:[0m
[34m# Audience for Data Science Learning Path[0m

[34mEarly-career professionals or career changers interested in entering the data science field. This path [0m
[34mtargets individuals with little to no prior experience who want to:[0m
[1;34m1[0m[34m. Understand data science fundamentals[0m
[1;34m2[0m[34m. Build a foundation in statistics[0m
[1;34m3[0m[34m. Learn Python programming specifically for data analysis[0m

[34mThe curriculum is designed for beginners who are methodically building skills to analyze data sets using [0m
[34mindustry-standard tools and approaches.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m

[33mYou are an L&D administrator at a large enterprise organization, and regularly create training programs for[0m
[33mvarious professional audiences.[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mNursing professionals are expected to have both clinical and business skills to succeed in management [0m
[33mroles. This learning path teaches the skills needed to excel in healthcare management: business basics, [0m
[33mproject management, financial literacy, and how to use AI tools to enhance productivity. Tune in, pass the [0m
[33mfinal exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[33mWant to learn what microservices are all about? This architecture pattern helps developers work faster and [0m
[33mbuild more resilient systems. These courses cover everything from beginner foundations to advanced patterns[0m
[33mand refactoring codebases. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your professional certificate.[0m

[33mDevOps is not a framework or a workflow. DevOps ensures collaboration and communication between software [0m
[33mengineers [0m[1;33m([0m[33mDev[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m and IT operations [0m[1;33m([0m[33mOps[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m. Whether you are new to DevOps or looking to review the [0m
[33mfundamentals, these courses can help. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[33mC++ is renowned for its performance, control, and versatility. Ready to get started? Begin by mastering the[0m
[33mfundamentals and then progress to proven techniques for writing well-organized, efficient code. By the end,[0m
[33myou'll have the knowledge you need to create your own C++ programs and applications. Tune in, pass the [0m
[33mfinal exam, and earn your professional certificate.[0m

[33mContainers help developers pack up their applications, ensuring they run smoothly anywhere. Software [0m
[33mdevelopers need to understand these technologies to deliver software as a team. Whether you are new to [0m
[33mDocker or looking to review the fundamentals, these courses can help. Tune in, pass the final exam, and [0m
[33mearn your certificate.[0m

[33mJavaScript is the key to a career in front-end development. These courses equip you with essential skills [0m
[33mto master the language, from fundamental concepts like variables and functions to advanced topics such as [0m
[33masynchronous tasks and DOM scripting. With hands-on practice and real-time feedback, you'll gain the [0m
[33mexpertise needed to excel in web development. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m
[33m================================[0m

[33mYour team is going to publish a certtificate program titled:[0m
[33mAnaconda Python for Data Science Professional Certificate[0m

[33mNow look at this list of course titles and descriptions for a curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mcourse.[0m
[33m**Statistics Foundations [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m: The Basics**: Learn to understand your data using basics of statistics, such as[0m
[33mdefining the middle, mean, and median of your data set; measuring the standard deviation; and finding [0m
[33moutliers.[0m
[33m**Statistics Foundations [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m: Using Data Sets**: Go beyond the basics of statistics with practical, [0m
[33mexample-based lessons to learn how data sets and statistics are used in the real world.[0m

[33m**Python Data Analysis**: Interested in using Python for data analysis? Learn how to use Python, NumPy, and[0m
[33mpandas together to analyze data sets large and small.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mHow would you describe this learning path? Structure your answer like the examples given above, and use [0m
[33mthis overall pattern:[0m

[1;33m1[0m[33m. **Introduction**: Introduce the topic or subject matter.[0m
[1;33m2[0m[33m. **Value Proposition**: Highlight the benefits or outcomes of engaging with the content.[0m
[1;33m3[0m[33m. **Course Overview**: Provide a brief overview of what the courses cover or what skills will be learned.[0m
[1;33m4[0m[33m. **Call to Action**: The final sentence should always be [0m[33m"Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your [0m
[33mcertificate."[0m

[33mThe length of your answer should be between [0m[1;33m40[0m[33m and [0m[1;33m60[0m[33m words.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m

[33mthat from the course descriptions.[0m

[33moutliers.[0m

[1;32mâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ [0mMessage[1;32m â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€[0m
